Accessibility

Website Accessibility Statement

Reel Florida Outdoors (RFLO) is committed to facilitating the accessibility and usability all of its digital properties, including ‚ÄúReelFloridaOutdoors.com‚Äù, for all people with disabilities. Reel Florida Outdoors (RFLO) has implemented the relevant portions of the World Wide Web Consortium's Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0 Level AA (WCAG 2.0 AA) as its web accessibility standard. Our website is tested on a periodic basis with assistive technology such as screen readers and screen magnifiers, and with users with disabilities who use these technologies.

Our efforts in accessibility are ongoing. If you have specific questions or concerns about the accessibility of any particular web page owned by Reel Florida Outdoors (RFLO) , please contact us:

Email: ReelFloridaOutdoors@gmail.com
